did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Awards, citations, correspondence, clippings, orders, printed matter, reports, and photographs, relating to American military activities in the China-Burma-India Theater during World War II.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Joseph A. Cranston papers, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1974.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Note
bioghist.p: Brigadier general, United States Army; commanding general, Services of Supply, Intermediate Section, China-Burma-India Theater, 1943-1945.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Awards, citations, correspondence, clippings, orders, printed matter, reports, and photographs, relating to American military activities in the China-Burma-India Theater during World War II.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: World War, 1939-1945--Campaigns--East Asia.
World War, 1939-1945--Equipment and supplies.

did.unittitle: Awards, citations, correspondence, clippings, orders, printed matter, and reports, relating to American military activities in the China-Burma-India Theater during World War II.

scopecontent.p: Formerly security-classified records of the U.S. government. Arranged chronologically by date of release by Hoover
Air movement tables for Chinese troops

did.unittitle: 156 prints of typical construction at United States Army Installations of the Intermediate Section of the India-Burma Theater,

Photo album containing 148 prints of individual and group shots of Brigadier General Cranston while Commanding General of Intermediate Section, China-India-Burma Theater; various shots of interest in India, Burma; aerial views of China; and photos of General Cranston with military and civilian personalities including Louis Mountbatten, Supreme Allied Commander (British). South East Asia,
